text: Maksym Hrysyo (; born 14 May 1996) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for FC Lviv. ==Career== Hrysyo is the product of the UFK Lviv School System and then played for FC Karpaty in the Ukrainian Premier League Reserves and Under 19 Championship during 3 seasons. He made his debut for FC Karpaty as a main-squad player in a game against FC Stal Kamianske on 23 July 2016 in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==References == ==External links== *Statistics at FFU website (Ukr) * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pustomyty Raion Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Karpaty Lviv players Category:FC Rukh Lviv players Category:FC Cherkashchyna players Category:FC Lviv players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Ukrainian First League players
title: Maksym Hrysyo
